title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-14] [$250] Custom report name - Delete option is present for Title report field but unable to delete it
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to workspace settings > Rules.
3. Enable Custom report name.
4. Click Custom name.
5. Clear the default value and enter random value.
6. Save it.
7. Go to workspace chat.
8. Submit an expense.
9. Go to expense report.
10. Click on the Title report field.
11. Click 3-dot menu > Delete.
12. Click Delete.

Expected result: The Title report field should disappear after deleting it.

Actual result: None
